{{lead.First Name:default=Customer}} - Your TriTech.com IQ webinar is starting now.
Wendy and Charlie will be demonstrating TriTech.com IQ in just a few minutes.
Log on now so you don't miss a thing!
Trouble logging in? Please Note: Everyone who has registered will receive a link to the recording of today's webinar.
If you have trouble accessing the GoToWebinar program, please call 800-263-6317 to reach the GoToWebinar Support Team. WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK: {{member.webinar url:default=URL}}
ALTERNATE LOGIN: http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/ <http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/> Webinar ID: 398758279 DATE: Thursday, April 11
TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Wendy Gilbert, Director of Product Management Charlie Barry, Senior Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800-263-6317 to reach the GoToWebinar Support Team
